summary:
Getting things done in a pragmatic way, while being sensitive and empathic to the situation that’s how I would describe myself.  

Getting people in the right place and help them get the best out of themselves is what motivates me. 
I have a passion to understand people. My career goal is to motivate people, develop them and help them find their own direction, next to successfully growing teams in close cooperation with managers and help them build a team for the long run. 

Adyen is the leading technology provider powering payments for global commerce in the 21st century. With a seamless solution for mobile, online and in-store transactions, our technology enables merchants to accept almost any type of payment, anywhere in the world.

Open. Creative. International. These are just a few words that describe Adyen’s working culture. And that culture is the same at any of our worldwide locations. We don’t separate one department from another with thick walls. And the few walls we have are made of glass. This allows us to easily discuss our customers’ needs. Chat about ideas for new software. Pop over to a colleague’s desk with a new business lead. Interested in joining us? Please check our job listings at https://www.adyen.com/careers

profile_positions.description:
In my role as SVP of HR at Adyen I am the representative of HR in the global leadership team, helping to scale the company and build it out to the next level. As a team we have the responsibility to support the company's leadership, think about decisions and the impact they have company broad.

In this role I am also still responsible for Global Business Partnering, Learning and Development and DEI.
profile_positions.title: SVP of HR

profile_positions.description: In my role as Head of People Growth I am globally responsible for the HR Business Partners, our Learning & Development team and Diversity Equity & Inclusion at Adyen.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of People Growth

profile_positions.description:
Empowerment, actively supporting and leading the HR team is something I've been keen on during my time at Adyen. Working closely, sharpening ideas and setting goals together with the leads for the defined teams in HR: Recruitment, HR Innovations, Business Partners, Learning, Rewards and the regions. 

Working together with the CTO and engineering solution leads, my team and I support 70+ managers in tech. In leading this team my main focus is to advise, support and coach my team and our engineering managers in Amsterdam to successfully lead their teams whilst growing fast as a department and keeping the speed to launch fast and iterate. Leadership development is one of the focus areas for me closely working together with the learning and development team, but also talent development, DEI and translating our engineering needs into a recruitment strategy together with the Tech Recruitment team are part of my responsibilities.
profile_positions.title: HR Business Partner Lead for Tech

profile_positions.description: As an HR Business Partner for Tech my main focus was advising, supporting and coaching managers in the Development, Product and Infrastructure team in Amsterdam. Team lead development, wellbeing, onboarding, staying close to Adyen Formula and performance management are some of the topics I spend time on.
profile_positions.title: HR Business Partner Tech

profile_positions.description:
During this period I have temporarily filled the role of Global Recruitment Lead (maternity cover) next to my role as an HR Business Partner for Tech.

In this role I led a team of 7 recruiters in HQ and worked closely with 3 regional recruiters and the HR team. We’re always attracting, finding, selecting and hiring the talented workforce of Adyen in Amsterdam, San Francisco, Singapore, Sydney, Sao Paulo, and other international offices.
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Lead

profile_positions.description: As a global HR Business Partner during this period my main focus was on the rewards and remuneration for our employees worldwide (improving the communication and execution of commercial bonus plans, a compliance review worldwide, renewing pension plans, the yearly salary review, upgrading local and global benefits).
profile_positions.title: Global Rewards & Remuneration

profile_positions.description: As an HR Business Partner, I have been responsible for APAC, Europe and Amsterdam regarding employee matters and team development. Handling employee related issues around absence management and performance management is something I do on a daily basis, next to identifying people trends within the business and work together with my key stakeholders in order to formulate and implement solutions.
profile_positions.title: Global HR Business Partner

profile_positions.description: In my role as a Recruiter I am working on a global scale to find the best talent and smartest people for Adyen. I am responsible for building up an efficient recruitment process, but also identifying, sourcing, interviewing and hiring top candidates for current positions in any of our offices worldwide. To make recruitment easier for my hiring managers and myself, I have implemented an ATS (Greenhouse) succesfully, defined a recruitment process and developed an Interview Training.
profile_positions.title: Global Recruiter
Recruiter

profile_positions.description: As a trainee for Booking.com, I was responsible for the full recruitment process from identifying, sourcing and attracting Customer Service Executives all the way to interviewing and hiring (+/- 150 in 5 months time). I proactively developed relationships within the business, and worked closely together with the local HR support as well as our international customer service recruitment colleagues.
profile_positions.title: HR Trainee

profile_positions.description: ‘Het Nieuwe Traineeship’ is an independent personal development project for young talent finalizing their studies and who are new or entering the market. In an on- and offline community we worked together on different themes and subjects. Besides the coaching, a reality case started as well. For this reality case we organized an event for more than 30 people with the subject 'Here am I', to give an  insight in what we were busy with in this project.
profile_positions.title: Participant

profile_positions.description:
This research project from the University of Groningen was organized by students who were selected on knowledge and motivation. First preliminary research was conducted in the Netherlands, after which all research members travelled to Brazil for 10 weeks to carry out the field research.

Together with Otto Schepers I conducted a research for Sif Group. Sif Group is a global commercial operating company, specialized in fabrication of thick walled, welded tubular components according to clients specifications and international standards. The research goal was to find out the possibilities and opportunities for Sif group at the Brazilian oil and gas market.
profile_positions.title: Participant/ Researcher IBR Brazil 2012
